content: What is this life if full of care No time to stand n stare No fursat to stand beneath the boughs N stare as long as sheep n cows Fursat is the elixir of life I have all the fursat in the world n can find more fursat to read brilliant blogs on fursat the necessity of living and admiring life Excellent blog Dil dhoondta hain phir wahi fursat ke raat din
